fields.title: Phase 1
fields.result: Clear direction for job search and resume type

fields.title: Phase 2
fields.start: Full results of intake call and phase 1 analysis received
fields.end: Hired Labs approves of initial job set and tailored resume sets
fields.result: First actionable set of open jobs and tailored resumes ready for transmission to participante

fields.title: Phase 3
fields.start: Initial set of jobs and resumes sent to participant
fields.end: Changes made to general format of resume or direction of job search
fields.result: Initial set of jobs and resumes agreed upon by Hired Labs and participant

fields.title: Phase 4
fields.start: Participant accepts the initial list of open jobs and tailored resumes
fields.end: Maximum number iterations of job lists and tailored resumes has been reached
fields.result: Participant submitted results of job applications

fields.title: Phase 5
fields.start: Hired Labs contacts participant to declare end to process and request feedback
fields.end: Participant submits feedback on overall process and anything else they feel is relevant

fields.title: Nurture
fields.start: Participant becomes inactive, either by completing the process, or by dropping out along the way
fields.end: Participant re-engages with Hired Labs, and becomes active

fields.title: Do Not Contact
fields.start: Participant asks Hired Labs not to contact them anymore
fields.end: Participant explicitly requests to be contacted again by Hired Labs
